title: Whats the best runes to use for a support?
body:
Most games I played support (Sona, Soraka, Karma, Nami and Janna) and I don't know what runes to use for them or best for them. For me I was thinking to use mana regen cause I can stay longer and protect my ADC by keep using heal or shield. I ask for advice from other people they say that you need AP runes (no need for mana regen), more CDR runes and defense runes. 
I need help! any suggestion will help.
I call all the SUPPORT players please help !
<3 support

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Fallion,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=BgxJU4f2,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-10T03:48:44.990+0000)
>
> Most games I played support (Sona, Soraka, Karma, Nami and Janna) and I don't know what runes to use for them or best for them. For me I was thinking to use mana regen cause I can stay longer and protect my ADC by keep using heal or shield. I ask for advice from other people they say that you need AP runes (no need for mana regen), more CDR runes and defense runes. 
> I need help! any suggestion will help.
> I call all the SUPPORT players please help !
> <3 support

For **Janna** I am getting a lot of value from the following

**Marks =  9 x Armor
Seals  =  9 x HP
Glyphs = 9 x MR
Quints = 3 x scaling MP5**

The reason this works (for me) is that the biggest constraint on my casting in the early-mid game is _mana_ rather than cool down. Janna can benefit from AP but for her main job of **peel** it's not critical. Scaling MP5 Quints are strong enough that I don't need to focus on mana items. The 50% or 100% increases on mana regen from her standard items are sufficient. 

I usually avoid scaling runes on supports, but the MP5s scale fast enough that they work. By level 5 they're about as good, and better from level 6 onwards.

I have been using Flat Armour marks seals and quints with scaling MR glyphs with leona, that coupled with her W makes her an early game moving titanium wall that stuns and roots. very effective I have found, give it a go.

Marks - Armour or Hybrid Pen
Seals - HP or Armour
Glyphs - MR or AP
Quints - Armour, AP or Movespeed

Depends on your playstyle.

I personally run.
Marks: Hybrid Pen
Seals: 5 HP 4 Armour
Glyphs: AP
Quints: 2 Armour 1 AP

No MR but gives 40HP 13 Armour and 16 AP which is comparable to what an AP midlaner starts with.

In my opinion you NEVER want to take scaling runes on a support because in 99% of games you are going to be the lowest level and it takes you a long time to get the real advantage of scaling runes. Also bottom lane is very focused on early game power, so you need the flat stats for the level 2-3 all ins thats usually come.

As a support you usually build a lot of CDR and Mana regen and I hate going over the cdr cap. Doesnt sit right in my head. Most the champs you said start {{item:3303}}  so you will be getting mana regen and cdr pretty early on with a {{item:3092}}

There are many different runes for those champions what i use is. 
Either Magic Pen or Hybrid Pen or even Amour - Reds 

Either HP per lvl or Amour - Yellows Depending on your choice i prefer hp per lvl for that little more hp your not going to get cause your building things that don't give you health so your Zekes (You get armour from this), frost queens etc. 

Blues are kinda your choice if you like that little bit extra sustain on those heal abilities say janna's e or nami's w you def run ap blues or if you are vs a high ap lane say a corki + a ap lane bully (Lux, Annie, Sona) then go mr blues 

Quints you would again your choice and depending on lane would run either Movementspeed or ap quints i've been trying out hp runes on janna, sona and they don't work out that well

This is all probably confusing but if you want more tanky/sustain lane 
Magc pen - reds
Hp per lvl - yellows
MR - Blues
AP - Quints

If you want more of a damage lane if your with say a Graves, Corki, Lucain go
Magc pen or Hybrid pen depending on sona i would go hybrid rest i would go magic pen - reds
Hp or hp per lvl your choice - Yellows
AP - Blues
AP - Quints 

PS. you get that mana regen mastery and once late game you get a lot of mana regen items so theres no point running mana regen runes its a waste with what other runes give as well. 

Hope this helps as i play a lot of support. (One of those guys that fill and get support but i like getting carried)

(Forgot you had karma there here is runes for her as she is really different to the rest of them
Magic pen - reds
Amour or hp - yellows 
Magic pen Blues or AP blues your choice her base damage and with her mantra q it deals a lot of damage so running Magic pen blues would increase that damage as well 
AP - Quints 
As i said she is different as her base scaling on damage abilities are higher and you build more aggressive then the other champions you put on the list so this would A. let you deal more damage and B. give you enough ap for the early game shielding. And you want to poke as much as you can with karma, these runes work with Zyra and Annie too really well)

thank you so much ! that helps alot and it can help other support players too.
I really appreciate your strategy.
